products.name: Spray 'n Wash Laundry Stain Remover Trigger Spray

extendedInfo.detail: 1st time stain removal even in cold water. Better on over 100 stains (Than detergent alone). 1st Time amazing stain removal. Hints from the Experts: May be used with other laundry additives. Safe for colorfast washables (Excluding washable silk, khaki and fluorescent clothing) and works in all temperatures. Always test garment before using by applying to an inconspicuous area. If possible, treat and launder while stain is still fresh. Certain stains may be impossible to remove such as rust, dried paint, permanent ink or bleach stains. Do not let dry on garments or surfaces. Avoid over-spraying on plastic and painted surfaces. Do not rub on chocolate stains. Do not leave on garment for more then 5 minutes. Health. Hygiene. Home. Questions? 1-800-228-4722. For more ingredient information visit www.rbnainfo.com.  Our Home Our Planet: Save Energy: Great results even in coldd water! www.ourhome-ourplanet.com.
extendedInfo.ingredients: Water, C12-16 Alcohols Ethoxylated C10-16 Alcohols Ethoxylated, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Tetraborate Decahydrate, Sodium Polyacrylate, Protease Enzyme, Fragrance, Calcium Chloride, Benzisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, Potassium Chloride.
extendedInfo.directions: Directions: (1) Turn nozzle to on position. (2) Spray onto the stain, covering it completely (3) Wait 5 minutes maximum. (4) Rub into stain. (5) Wash according to care label instructions in the warmest water recommended. On Off. Spray and leave for 5 minutes max.
extendedInfo.warnings: Caution: Eye and skin irritant. Read precautions on back.Caution: Eye and skin irritant. May be harmful if directly inhaled. Do not get in eyes, on skin or inhale spray. Do not treat garments while wearing. Contains surfactants and enzyme.First Aid: If in eyes, Immediately rinse eyes with plenty of water. Remove any contact lenses and continue rinsing eyes for at least 15 minutes. If irritation develops, get medical attention. If on skin, wash with soap and water. If imitation develops, get medical attention. If inhaled and imitation or an allergic reaction occurs get medical attention. If swallowed, rinse mouth. Call a physician or Poison Control Center if you feel unwell.Keep out of reach of children. Contains no phosphorus.
